SEARCH
Package net.tangly.core.providers

Interface Provider<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the instances
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProviderHasOid, ProviderInMemory, ProviderPersistence, ProviderView
public interface Provider<T>
Defines the provider abstraction responsible for handling all instances of a specific type.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Deletes the data associated with the entity.

  • Method Details

    • findByOid

      static <E extends HasOid, Long> Optional<E> findByOid(@NotNull @NotNull Provider<E> provider, long oid)

    • findById

      static <E extends HasId, String> Optional<E> findById(@NotNull @NotNull Provider<E> provider, String id)

    • items

      List<T> items()
      Returns a list containing all known instances of the entity type.
      Returns:
      list of all instances

    • update

      void update(@NotNull T entity)
      Updates the data associated with the entity. If the entity is new, the update is handled as a create operation. The update is transitive and all referenced entities are also updated. The entity given as parameter becomes the instance managed through the provider.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to update

    • delete

      void delete(@NotNull T entity)
      Deletes the data associated with the entity. The object identifier is invalidated.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to delete

    • updateAll

      default void updateAll(@NotNull @NotNull Iterable<? extends T> items)
      Updates the data associated with all entities.
      Parameters:
      items - entities to update

    • findBy

      default <U> Optional<T> findBy(Function<T,U> getter, U value)
      Returns the first entity which property matches the value.
      Type Parameters:
      U - type of the property
      Parameters:
      getter - getter to retrieve the property
      value - value to compare with
      Returns:
      optional of the first matching entity otherwise empty
